description: After a mushroom pasta recipe to whip up for a midweek dinner? With only two steps and five ingredients, enjoy delicious mushroom tortellini any day of the week.
name: Tortellini & Mushrooms In Chicken Broth Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add mushroom and thyme, then cook for 8 minutes or until softened and browned.

Add stock to mushroom mixture and bring to a simmer. Add tortellini and cook according to packet instructions. Ladle tortellini mixture into bowls, season with black pepper and serve sprinkled with parmesan.
